thread.title: James Rodriguez: Chelsea and Man Utd transfer hopes dashed | Metro News
thread.title_full: James Rodriguez: Chelsea and Man Utd transfer hopes dashed | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: James Rodriguez: Chelsea and Man Utd transfer hopes dashed | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 5:33 pm James Rodriguez is happy at Real Madrid (Picture: Getty) 
James Rodriguez has all but ruled out the prospect of a transfer to Chelsea or Manchester United any time soon by committing his future to Real Madrid. Rumour Mill: our round-up of football gossip, rumours and speculation 
The Colombia international was strongly linked with both Premier League clubs during the January transfer window, though a move never materialised as he remained at the Bernabeu. 
Despite not playing a key role in Zinedine Zidaneâ€™s first-team for much of this season and last, Rordriguez insists he wants to stay at the club for a long time and is not looking to leave. Rodriguez has long been linked with a move to England (Picture: Getty) 
This looks like bad news for Chelsea, United and other top sides, with Rodriguez seemingly accepting his current role with Real.
